DOC.brief_summary: Patients with an incisional hernia in the midline and controls with an intact abdominal wall are examined twice with one week apart, in order to establish the test-retest reliability and internal and external validity of the Goodstrength trunk dynamometer.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of the Goodstrength System for Assessment of Abdominal Wall Strength in Patients With Incisional Hernia
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists score 13 Age equal to or above 18 Ventral incisional hernia OR intact abdominal wall Pregnancy Severe heart disease (New York Heart Association class IIIIV) Severe pulmonary disease Severe musculoskeletal disease Systemic treatment with glucocorticoid
